instruction: Describe in general terms what happens in the first days after someone gets infected with Covid-19.
output: In the first days after someone gets infected with Covid-19, they may experience mild to severe respiratory symptoms such as coughing, fever, and shortness of breath. In some cases, they may also experience other symptoms such as a sore throat, body aches, fatigue, and nausea. The severity and duration of symptoms varies from person to person and may take up to 14 days to develop. It is important to seek medical treatment right away to monitor symptoms and get the best care possible.
